item.description: Rebecca's hosting our group's first ever movie night! We read (and either loved or hated!) Eat, Pray, Love. Now let's check out and weigh in on the movie! Rebecca has the movie and will have a bottle or two of Chianti, San Pellegrino water (and other beverages), some Italian chocolates and some other snacks. Bring your favorite Italian white or red wine, cannoli or other Italian pastries, olives, gelato or any other Italian, Indian or Balinese food or drink you'd like to share! The movie will start promptly at 7:30. Rebecca's address and directions will be sent out the night before for all who RSVP "yes" to going. Thanks for hosting Rebecca!
item.name: Movie Night - Eat, Pray, Love
